import React from 'react' import hindi from './img/hindi.png' export default function LangCards(props) { const cardStyle = { margin: '30px', padding: '11px', marginTop: '0px', // Note: React uses camelCase for hyphenated CSS properties backgroundColor: 'rgb(19,31,36)', color: 'white', width: '51%', transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease' } return (
{props.val}
) }
